Title: Controlling Bullet
Description: After pinging a Yellow Orb, next Red Orb will inflict Blast and deal Fire DMG to a small area.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Inflicts Electrocute on enemies after a Blue Orb 3-Ping, then ping a Yellow Orb and Red Orb to deal great Physical DMG and additional Fire DMG.

Title: Lotus - Dual Blades
Description: Pinging a Red Orb within 4 seconds after any 3-Ping will make Lucia Burst. Lucia then replaces Basic Attacks with Dual Blades.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Attacks will deal an additional Fire DMG after a Blue Orb 3-Ping. Ping a Red Orb next to attack with "Lotus - Dual Blades" to deal CRIT DMG.

Title: Core Laser
Description: Pinging a Red Orb after any 3-Ping will trigger core lasers to deal 10 times of Physical DMG to a wide area.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Attracts the nearby enemies by a Yellow Orb 3-Ping, then ping a Red Orb to unleash 'Core Lasers' that deal high Group DMG.

Title: Wing Shot
Description: Gains additional Energy when hitting enemies with a Yellow Orb Combo to speed up using of Signature Move.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Triggers 3 times of "Passive: Quiver of Mercy" by any 3-Ping and stores 3 energy arrows. Then perform a Signature Move to deal great Physical DMG.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Adds maximum damage to the weapon with a Blue Orb 3-Ping, then deals high damage with Basic Attacks.

Title: EX - Slash Storm
Description: Core Passive: When pinging a Yellow Orb after any 3-Ping, Nanami will use EX - Slash Storm and launch 8 consecutive attacks at surrounding targets, dealing * Physical DMG per attack.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Quickly dash at the target location with a Red Orb 3-Ping, then ping a Yellow Orb to perform 'Ex - Slash Storm' to deal high Physical DMG.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Pulls the nearby enemies by a Blue Orb 3-Ping, then ping a Yellow Orb to perform : 'Ex - Slash Storm' and deals Physical DMG to a wide area.

Title: Offence-Defense Rhythm
Description: Counterattacks and unleashes sword waves after a successful block, dealing Physical DMG to the enemy and increasing your own DMG.

Title: Great Slash
Description: Slash deals 1 additional damage when performing a Red Orb 3-Ping.

Title: Artillery Tactics
Description: After 3 times of 3-Ping or performing a Signature Move, Karenina will Burst for 3 seconds and the next Basic Attack will become a ranged artillery attack.

Title: Artillery Tactics
Description: After 3 times of 3-Ping or performing a Signature Move, Karenina will Burst for 3 seconds and the next Basic Attack will become a ranged artillery attack.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Ping a Blue Orb to gather the enemies, then use a Signature Move to deal area damage and trigger Passive: Burst Mode to deal high damage.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Marks the enemy by a Yellow Orb 3-Ping and enters Burst Mode, dealing Physical and Fire DMG by triggering the Mark to explode.

Title: Fleeting Phantom
Description: Any 3-Ping attack will mark an enemy. Launching a 3-Ping attack at the marked enemy again will release an energy clone. The clone will attack once with each Basic Attack.

Title: Sneak Attack
Description: Ping a Yellow Orb and quickly goes behind the enemy. Attacks the back of the target to trigger the effect of "Sneak Attack" to increase damage.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Ping a Yellow Orb and quickly go behind the enemy, then ping a Blue Orb and attack the back of the enemy to deal Critical Strike.

Title: Lotus - Lightning Dance
Description: Marks the enemy by pinging Blue Orbs or Yellow Orbs. Attacking an enemy marked by Lucia has a chance to launch lightning attacks that deal Lightning DMG.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Ping a Yellow Orb and deploys a lightning field, then use a Red Orb 3-Ping to increase the number of extra attack and deal high Physical and Lightning DMG.

Title: Reversed Egretfield
Description: Attacking a marked enemy with Basic Attacks and Red Orb attacks has a chance to trigger Lightning Lure. When it's triggered for the 5th time, Ex - Lightning Lure will be used, dealing Lightning DMG to enemies and healing the allies in the area.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Red Orb 3-Ping will trigger Lightning Lure.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Ping a Yellow Orb to attract enemies and mark them by pinging a Blue Orb, then trigger Passive: Lightning Lure by a Basic Attack.

Title: Fighting Will
Description: Gains 10 Energy by a 3-Ping. Takes less Physical and Dark DMG under the effect of Twin Cores.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: When performing a Signature Move, quickly recover Energy and increases the duration by any 3-Ping.

Title: Goddess Connection System
Description: Enhances the weapon. Increases hit and damage of Basic Attacks.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Ping a Blue Orb to attract enemies. Increase attacking frequency by pinging Yellow Orbs and Basic Attack combos for a higher chance to trigger "Passive: Light Penalty".

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Performs any 3-Ping to increase stacks of passive skills and recovers HP.

Title: Thermal System
Description: Gathers thermal energy by a 3-Ping or Signature Move. Becomes Enhanced when thermal energy reaches 50%.

Title: Thermal System
Description: Ping a Blue Orb to call for an aircraft which gains thermal energy from each attack.

Title: Recommended Combo
Description: Performs any 3-Ping + Red Orb combo to release an enhanced Red Orb.

Title: Core Passive +1
Description: For a period of time after performing a Signature Move, Movement Speed will be increased and Basic Attacks will deal Fire DMG and reduce Fire Resistance of the target.

Title: Crimson Abyss - Blade Will
Description: Any 3-Ping after a Blue Orb 3-Ping to enter Blade Will state. Signal Orbs will be converted into Special Orbs which unleashes sword waves when pinged.

Title: Core Passive +1
Description: Ping a Blue Orb after any 3-Ping to release Vector Cube. Draws in enemies when storing power, reduces their DMG dealt, and receives a shield for 7s. Deals DMG to a large area after storing power.

Title: Core Passive +1
Description: Ping a Red Orb after any 3-Ping to release Cosmic Wave. Enters a stat-enhanced state after using the skill, adding Dark DMG to Basic Attack.
